relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/gallops/rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezing/rales/rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended, tender to percussion at right lower quadrant, positive guarding, positive obturator sign on right, absent iliopsoas and Rovsing's sign, hyperactive bowel sounds.
